ComicInfo.Series: DCeased: War of the Undead Gods
ComicInfo.Summary: Alfred suffers from nightmares of his killing of Bruce, Dick, and Tim. Damian and Jon lead a team to join the Green Lanterns on Oa, where they learn that the Guardians want to prevent the spread of the virus by exterminating life on planets that have been infected. Meanwhile, Maxima and Primaa fight to defend Almerac against Darkseid and the undead New Gods.
